Class DataNodeRendererBase

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Base class for data-bound node renderers. Provides common functionality for interactive nodes.

public abstract class DataNodeRendererBase : DefaultNodeRenderer, IEditableNodeRenderer, IDataNodeRenderer, INodeRenderer

CreateDataBoundVisual(Node, INodeProcessor?, NodeRenderContext)

Creates the visual with data binding context.

public virtual Control CreateDataBoundVisual(Node node, INodeProcessor? processor, NodeRenderContext context)

Parameters

node Node

The node to render.

processor INodeProcessor

The node's data processor (may be null for display-only nodes).

context NodeRenderContext

The render context.

Returns

Control

A control bound to the node's data.

Finds a control by its Tag property.

protected static T? FindByTag<T>(Control root, string tag) where T : Control

Parameters

The root control to search from.

The tag value to match.

Returns

GetNodeFromVisual(Control)

Gets the Node associated with a visual control. Handles both direct Tag assignment and ResizableVisual dictionary storage. Use this method instead of directly accessing visual.Tag for Node lookups.

protected static Node? GetNodeFromVisual(Control visual)

Parameters

visual Control

The visual control to get the node from.

Returns

Node

The associated Node, or null if not found.
